entries.em1: So you're the new guy, huh?  My name is Ephant Mon, and you'll be working for me for a while.
entries.em3: What do you do around here?
entries.em4: A friend of mine named Tash Kolt sent me a distress call that was jammed at the source. I don't know how serious the situation is, but I want you to find out.
entries.em7: Start by talking to Hazir Gam'mur in Wayfar.  If anyone knows where Tash is, it will be Hazir.  I'll mark a location on your datapad where Hazir usually hangs out.
entries.em9: I need to do some things first.
entries.em10: I used to be a smuggler for Jabba, but I'm getting too old for that now.  What I do now is advise Jabba in certain situations.
entries.em11: What do you advise him on?
entries.em12: Can you introduce me to Jabba?
entries.em13: Well, this and that.  He and I used to be partners a long time ago.
entries.em14: Can you introduce me to him?
entries.em16: You're going to have to get a bit more reputation before Jabba will pay any attention to you.  If you can get some work done you'll be well on your way.
entries.em17: It's hard to say with Tash.  He may be in some trouble with the empire, or it may be someone he's annoyed.
entries.em19: What can I do to help?
entries.em20: Well, Tash is in and out of trouble all the time.  It could just be a misunderstanding, but I'd like to know for sure.  Can you help me out?
entries.em23: That's fine, come back and see me when you have some time.
entries.em24: Well, there's Max Rebo, Barada, Bib Fortuna, Jabba, of course, and the Gamorrean Guards.
entries.em30: Max is an Ortollan.  He's the band leader.  He seems to spend all his time thinking about his next meal, even when he's playing music.
entries.em31: Barada is Jabba's chief mechanic, and he also handles some of the mercenary work in the palace.
entries.em32: Bib is Jabba's Majordomo.  Everyone has to deal with him before speaking to Jabba directly.
entries.em33: The Gamorreans are fiercely loyal to Jabba, but not the brightest creatures in the galaxy.  They do their job well though, keeping out the riff-raff.
entries.em34: Jabba is a Hutt.  He's a powerful crime lord, and can be a useful ally.  Never cross him though.  No one has ever done so and lived long to talk about it.
entries.em36: I'm a friend of Ephant Mon.
entries.em37: Do you know where I can find Tash Kolt?
entries.em38: Ephant Mon?  Did he send you to see me?
entries.em41: Is there something I can do to help?
entries.em42: He's looking for Tash Kolt.  Do you know where he is?
entries.em43: Tell me where Tash Kolt is now!
entries.em44: Not at the moment.  I know he was having some problems.  Perhaps I can help you...
entries.em47: I know he was planning on moving, and that some thugs were looking for him.  If you find him, and those thugs are there, maybe you can help him out.
entries.em53: Here.  I'll add the location to your datapad.  Good luck.
entries.em54: I don't know anyone by that name.  Are you sure you're in the right place?
entries.em55: It's Ok.  I'm a friend of Ephant Mon.
entries.em57: Mentioned me in what context?  As a friend?
entries.em60: You have quite the attitude don't you?  Well if you do know Ephant Mon then tell him that I don't deal with your sort.  Perhaps he has other friends he can send to talk to me.
entries.em61: If you've come to apologize then maybe I can help you.
entries.em88: Wow!  You unloaded on those guys.  I've never seen anything like it!
entries.em89: Ephant Mon sent me to see how you were doing.
entries.em91: Good thing you showed up then.  Think you can hang around and keep the thugs off me while I load up my stuff and move out?
entries.em94: I'm loading up everything I own in the world.  Gotta keep one step ahead of these nerfherders.  I could use your help.
entries.em95: What do you want me to do?
entries.em97: Could you just hang around and make sure nobody bothers me while I'm packing?
entries.em100: Well, I understand.  Tell Ephant Mon he was a good friend.  I hope he won't miss my funeral.
entries.em117: Go and speak to Bib Fortuna again.
